H0.text: The name of which island is thought to come from the Norse for 'puffin island'. Fair Isle

H1.text: The name of which island is thought to come from the Norse for 'puffin island'. Skomer Island

H2.text: The name of which island is thought to come from the Norse for 'puffin island'. May Island

H3.text: The name of which island is thought to come from the Norse for 'puffin island'. Lundy

A4.text: The name of the English island Lundy is believed to come from the old Norse word for 'puffin island' (Lundey)
